nodes.text: Spir Fraxis was a human male smuggler in the band of the Aqualish Bandin Dobah in the period following the Battle of Yavin during the Galactic Civil War. He had a quarrel with a group of spacers when he tried to dredge Zukata, a female Rodian. He was later killed by the same group when they succeeded to release R4-W9, an R4-series agromech droid stole by Bandin Dobah.
